cellxgene.census 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

CZ CELLxGENE Discover Census

The cellxgene.census package provides an API to facilitate the use of the CZ CELLxGENE Discover Census. For more information about the API and the project visit the chanzuckerberg/cellxgene-census GitHub repo.

Status: Pre-release, under rapid development. Expect API changes.

Also see the Python API.

Installation

You can install the development version of cellxgene.census from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("chanzuckerberg/cellxgene-census/api/r/cellxgene.census")
print(cellxgene.census::open_soma())

(minimal apt dependencies: r-base cmake git)

Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

library(cellxgene.census)
## basic example code

For More Help

For more help, please file a issue on the repo, or contact us at soma@chanzuckerberg.com

If you believe you have found a security issue, we would appreciate notification. Please send email to security@chanzuckerberg.com.
